fields.description: Gets or sets a list of system events. Supported events: "connected" and "disconnected". Blocking event "connect" is not supported because it requires a response.
fields.name: SystemEvents

fields.description:
Gets or sets a matching pattern for event names.
There are 3 kinds of patterns supported:
    1. "*", it matches any event name
    2. Combine multiple events with ",", for example "event1,event2", it matches events "event1" and "event2"
    3. A single event name, for example, "event1", it matches "event1"
fields.name: UserEventPattern
